Package org.dgfoundation.amp.algo

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExceptionConsumer<T>
    a consumer which is allowed to throw exceptions
    ExceptionRunnable<K extends java.lang.Exception>
    a piece of code which might throw an Exception
    Waver<K>
    interface which does a "wave" (typically database selects) generally wave(in) shouldn't contain elements from in also wave(wave(...wave(in))) shouldn't either
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlgoUtils
    various algorithmical utils
    AmpCollections  
    BooleanWrapper  
    ComparableList<K extends java.lang.Comparable>
    an opaque Comparable token
    DatabaseWaver
    a waver which selects ids using a query like SELECT DISTINCT(BLA) FROM FOO WHERE X IN (in)
    Graph<K>
    generic graph algorithm holder TODO: replace Set with a more efficient native-based implementation (like Trove or HPPC), in case this class will see heavy usage
    Memoizer<V>
    a lazy synchronized memoizer for an expensive-to-calculate value
    ValueWrapper<K>
    wraps a value in an object so that it could be referenced from within a Java7 callback
    VivificatingMap<K,V>
    an auto-vivificating map which delegates all of its calls and adds one more (getOrCreate())
